text: aur jab nabee ne apanee kuchh patniyon se ek[1] baat kahee, to usane use bata diya aur allaah ne use khol diya nabee par, to nabee ne kuchh se soochit kiya aur kuchh ko chhod diya. phir jab soochit kiya aapane patni ko usase, to usane kahaah kisane soochit kiya aapako is baat se? aapane kahaah moojhe soochit kiya hai sab jaanane aur sabase soochit rahane vaale ne
